dt: {bc}a writ granted by a court of equity whereby one is required to do or to refrain from doing a specified act
{bc}the act or an instance of enjoining {bc}{sx|order||}, {sx|admonition||}

et: Middle English {it}injunccion{/it}, from Anglo-French & Late Latin; Anglo-French {it}enjunxion{/it}, from Late Latin {it}injunction-, injunctio{/it}, from Latin {it}injungere{/it} to enjoin {ma}{mat|enjoin|}{/ma}
shortdef: a writ granted by a court of equity whereby one is required to do or to refrain from doing a specified act
the act or an instance of enjoining : order, admonition
